problem_statement: OpenFOAM simulations via WSL fail silently, returning placeholder data (0 elements, 0 temps). The E2E test shows the pipeline returns quickly but with empty results.

hypotheses.title: WSL Path Escaping Bug
hypotheses.description: Windows paths with spaces or backslashes may not be correctly converted to WSL format, causing gmshToFoam to fail.

hypotheses.title: Gmsh Mesh Format Incompatibility
hypotheses.description: gmshToFoam may require MSH version 2 format and specific element types. The current mesh may use unsupported formats.

hypotheses.title: Exception Swallowing in Pipeline
hypotheses.description: The OpenFOAMRunner may be catching exceptions and returning placeholder data instead of propagating errors.

integration_notes: Each hypothesis is self-contained. Fixes should be applied to shadow copies in task folders. The Weaver stage will merge successful fixes.
